name: One of the Cool Kids
description:
One of The Cool Kids WARNING: Violence, Occult, Mild Language and Kidnapping

You play as Cornelia, who is a struggling 16-year-old high schooler. One day during an awful day at work, she meets her newest client, Zack, the quarterback of the high school football team. He develops an interest in Cornelia during their session. Little does she know that Zack will change her life forever.

One of the Cool Kids is a text-based dark comedy-horror game. Viewer discretion is advised. This game is still a work in progress; therefore, all themes are not fleshed out, and all warnings are not yet discovered. More warning labels will add as needed.  Also, there maybe typos and bugs that will be fixed in future updates!

Feel free to comment or contact me on my Twitter (https://twitter.com/endeavors_vc)

Credits:
